note:
Boring old (1969) he/him know-it-all. Despite that mostly friendly I hope.
Rotterdammer in the Italian region of Calabria. I write mostly in Dutch. I'm a leftie in more ways than one. Sometimes I blog on stationzuid.wordpress.com.

From the river to the sea, Palestine WILL BE FREE.

Profile picture: myself, driving a car, seen from the passenger's side, en profil, black and white.
Header picture: the center of the city of Cosenza, a green hill with beige Italian buildings.
